input.sentences: the whole family came out for the wedding of their loved ones .
the parents were very proud to be included in the wedding party .
in tradition the bride was walked down the aisle by her father .
after the ceremony some hors d'oeuvres were served while the reception was set up .
finally it was time for the reception | where everyone had a wonderful time .
output.sentences: Can you believe they're getting married?
And look at all that food!
